name: spoticall node
description: Uses Twilio to receive a song name by SMS and returns a phone call with it playing.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio Account SID from https://twilio.com/console

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio Auth Token from https://twilio.com/console

TWILIO_CALL_HOSTNAME.description: The publicly addressable hostname of your application. This will be your Heroku apps URL.

TWILIO_SMS_MESSAGE.description: The message you want in the SMS reply.
